definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

pinyin: Jie2 xi1 ka3 · Ai4 er3 ba1

definition: para para, a Eurobeat dance originating in Japan, with synchronized upper body movements (loanword from Japanese)
para para, a Eurobeat dance originating in Japan, with synchronized upper body movements (loanword from Japanese)
forged money/fictitious bills/see also 芭樂|芭乐[ba1 le4]

sentences.english: Liddy, the master's great-granddaughter, was about Bathsheba's equal in age.
sentences.chinese: 丽蒂是作坊师傅的重孙女，和巴丝谢芭年龄相仿。

sentences.english: The elephants paint pictures in Elephant Show at Nongnooch Tropical Garden.
sentences.chinese: 泰国芭达雅东芭乐园的大象表演画图。

sentences.english: Then she sat down and laid her head on Babs' arm.
sentences.chinese: 然后，她坐下来，把头枕在芭布斯的胳膊上。

sentences.english: Along the river bank there is a hedge.

sentences.chinese: 做我的妻子吧，亲爱的柳芭。

sentences.english: Bathsheba tried not to show any expression on her face.
sentences.chinese: 芭丝谢芭努力地不使感情在脸上表现出来。

sentences.english: There is a fence (a)round the garden.
Six-year-old Gunda Arzhba myelinates her backhand with a Spartak coach.
sentences.chinese: 六岁的阿恣芭在教练的指导下练习反手击球。

sentences.english: Bathsheba paused to regard the idea at full length.
sentences.chinese: 巴丝谢芭停住了，仔细地考虑着这个主意。

sentences.english: No one else was in the room but the wise man's servant, whose name was Babette.
sentences.chinese: 房间里除了法师，就只有他的仆人芭贝特。

sentences.english: Bathsheba turned away into the shadows to consider.
sentences.chinese: 芭丝谢芭把头扭向阴影里考虑着。

sentences.english: Angrily, Bathsheba left the barn, followed by the other women.
sentences.chinese: 芭丝谢芭生气地走了，后边跟着其他的妇女们。

sentences.english: The elephants play darts in Elephant Show at Nongnooch Tropical Garden.
sentences.chinese: 泰国芭达雅东芭乐园的大象表演射飞镖。

sentences.english: 'I think you know her, 'Bathsheba went on.
sentences.chinese: “我想你认识她吧，”芭丝谢芭又说。

sentences.english: Of course, philippa would not turn away from her beloved work .
sentences.chinese: 当然，菲莉芭也不愿意离开她所热爱的工作。

sentences.english: And Baskin-Robbins is serving up ice cream with a marshmallow flavor.
sentences.chinese: 此外，芭斯罗缤还推出了一款棉花糖味的冰淇淋。

definition: see 莎草[suo1 cao3]/see 摩莎[mo2 suo1]
used in the transliteration of people's names
woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor
an article made of bamboo strips/fence
(phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
Carmen (name)/Carmen, 1875 opera by Georges Bizet 比才 based on novel by Prosper Mérimée 梅里美[Mei2 li3 mei3]
